_meta.description: Flat router demo — 4 of 29 sections shown
_meta.note: Simplified for illustration. Real router contains 29 entries with extended keyword sets and multi-section activation rules.

router.label: Paid Advertising
router.notes: Core acquisition section. Almost always co-activated with AUDIENCES. Co-activates UNIT_ECONOMICS when budget or ROAS is mentioned.

router.label: Sales Funnels & Conversion
router.notes: Frequently the first section activated for course/product business requests. Co-activates UNIT_ECONOMICS to enforce realistic conversion benchmarks.

router.label: Unit Economics
router.notes: Standalone section — activated directly when financial analysis is requested. Also co-activated by PAID_ADS and FUNNELS. Contains calculation templates for standardized outputs.

router.label: Reframing
router.notes: Largest single section (~25K words of domain content). Activated for positioning, objection handling, and perception-shift tasks. Almost always co-activates POSITIONING.

_activation_rules.single_match: If only one section matches, load that section only
_activation_rules.multi_match: If multiple sections match independently, load all matched sections
_activation_rules.co_activation: If a section is listed in 'activates_with' of a matched section, load it too
_activation_rules.conflict_resolution: When sections give conflicting guidance, the more specific section takes precedence
_activation_rules.fallback: If no section matches, respond from first principles and flag that KB was not used
